tag_list: sustainability, green-energy, renewable-energy, speaker, consultant, eco-preneur
overview:
A consummate ‘ideas’ man with no ‘real’ accomplishments ;), Cory Hoffart has spent most of his professional career helping homes and businesses use less energy and operate more sustainably. This encompassed operation analysis, finding problems and implementing solutions. These endeavors have led to be a somewhat sought after speaker on ‘green’ issues for meetings, conferences, etc. He has also been active in community organizations to advocate for municipal adoption of sustainable policies.

Although Mr. Hoffart’s true passion is in the energy field, he pursues any a multitude of entrepreneurial whenever he can. This currently has him helping with the launch of WimpIT, a Global Gadget Registry that aims to help gadgets find their rightful owners when lost, and more importantly, help devalue the stolen goods marketplace, making it more difficult for dirty thieves to sell those items they steal.
